product_name: CatEye HR-11 ANT+ Heart Rate Monitor Sensor Strap
long_description: The CatEye HR-11 ANT+ Heart Rate Monitor Sensor Strap features a comfortable chest strap and is compatible with CatEye and all other ANT+ cycling computers and watches that record heart rate. Adjustable fabric strap is made of a very soft, comfortable fabric.
short_description: The CatEye HR-11 ANT+ Heart Rate Monitor Sensor Strap features a comfortable chest strap and is compatible with CatEye and all other ANT+ cycling computers and watches that record heart rate.
